body.p:
To his Exclencey B. Magoffin
Govenor of kentucky
Sir

A Jury in Grant county issued a fine of $33.00 against one B Smith for a breach of the Peace the offence was commited in Dowingsville Grant County Kentucky and was simply an affray in which no person was injured in any manner, the Said B Smith is a verry poor man with a large family dependant entirely upon him for support.
We your humble petitioners Sincerely believe it be a suitable case for the interposition of your kindness & Executive indulgence and would earnesetly petition you to remit the fine Feby 1. 1861

A. Gross
Wm Jewitt
A. McGibany
Squire Childers
W. S. Ayres
W. C. Miller
P. F Hansbrough
H Gambell
James Hix
Squire Lucas

Grant Cir Ct.
Smith Berry
To } Petition
$33.
B. McGoffin Govenr of kentucky
Remitted
B. M
Issd Feby 5. 1861
